mods.abstract: Veiled Arab woman with water jug at Aboukir; Woman wearing a niqab, patterned garment under white drapery balances a plain bulbous water jug atop her head (foreground); "N 13...Photo...Fille Pellah..." in white along bottom of print.

titleInfo.title: Nineteenth and Early Twentieth Century Images of Egypt
